title: If you really wanted to nerf crits that much..
body: Then why not just buff Randuin's Omen crit damage reduction and/or revert Thornmail's reflect damage back to reflect damage taken? Wouldnt that be a better idea than to forcefully shaft any ADCs that remotely relies on crits?
